topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559ec75f6368720337000c43#post_559ec75f6368720337000c43
I _kind of_ am. I've been exposed to so many horror and slasher movies in recent years that I've become desensitized to the bad ones. If it genuinely scares me then it's a good horror movie.

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559ec75f6368720337000c43#post_559ec75f6368720337000c43

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559ec7fd63687202b600114a#post_559ec7fd63687202b600114a

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559ec82c63687202b60011a8#post_559ec82c63687202b60011a8
I wish I was still creeped out by movies. stories are the only thing that can genuinely creep me out. 

also jumpscares are bullshit. they're not scary, they're startling. plus they're only ever really good when there's no buildup. A lot of them are so telegraphed and it bugs the shit out of me.
